data.speaker: Player
data.content: The drawer is locked... There is a journal on the desk, however.

data.speaker: Player
data.content: It reads: " I lost the desk key feeding the one eyed crybaby in the middle. It just won't shut up!

data.speaker: Player
data.content: I might be able to find it if I remember which bed each other baby was in when I lost them...

data.speaker: Player
data.content: I'm gonna get in so much trouble... Maybe I can blame it on the night nurse?"
